text: Sihamte kerala e'itora pratiksata ache neki ye, sihamtara ocarata phiraista ahiba, athaba tomara raba ahiba, na'iba tomara raba’ra kono nidarsana ahiba? (Jani thoraa) yidina tomara raba’ra kono nidarsana ahiba se'idina yiye purbe imana ana nachila tara imana kono kamata nahiba, athaba yi byakti imanara madhyamata kalyana labha karaa na'i (tara imano kono kamata nahiba). Koraa, ‘tomaloke pratiksa karaa, ami'o pratiksata thakilo’
